text: Karl Gerald van den Boogaart is currently working as a Professor, TU Bergakademie Freiberg, Germany. Boogart was a recipient of the Andrei Borisovich Vistelius Research Award in 2003,https://www.iamg.org/2-uncategorised/51-2003-andrei-borisovich-vistelius- research- award.htmlhttps://www.iamg.org/documents/Newsletters/NewslettersHSP/NL66-high%20res.pdf, accessed 2018-09-16. and in 2014 he was selected to receive Georges Matheron Lectureship Award from the International Association for Mathematical Geosciences.https://www.iamg.org/images/File/documents/Newsletters/NewslettersHSP/NL88.pdf, accessed 2018-09-16. ==Education== *MS in Mathematics and Geography, in 1998, University of Augsburg *PhD in Spatial Statistics, in 2001 TU Bergakademie Freiberg ==Selected Book== ==References== Category:Living people Category:University of Augsburg alumni Category:Freiberg University of Mining and Technology alumni Category:Freiberg University of Mining and Technology faculty Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:21st-century German mathematicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Georges Matheron Lectureship recipients
title: Karl Gerald van den Boogaart
